author: Expanse

automation.description: Parses incident from Expanse in raw json to readable output
automation.name: ExpanseParseRawIncident

incidentfield.description: Expanse Behavior rule that incident violates
incidentfield.name: Expanse Behavior Rule

commands.description: Submits an IP address to check.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Returns information about the domain certificate.
commands.name: expanse-get-certificate

commands.description: Returns Risky Flows for the specified IP address. The maximum number of results is 20.
commands.name: expanse-get-behavior

commands.description: Deprecated command by Expanse. Returns exposure information about the ip.
commands.name: expanse-get-exposures

commands.description: Returns all domains which have been seen with the specified certificate.
commands.name: expanse-get-domains-for-certificate

integration.description: Deprecated. Use the Expanse v2 integration instead. The Expanse App for Demisto leverages the Expander API to retrieve network exposures and risky flows to create incidents in Demisto.  This application also allows for IP, Domain, Certificate, Behavior, and Exposure enrichment, retrieving assets and exposures information drawn from Expanseâ€™s unparalleled view of the Internet.
integration.name: Expanse (Deprecated) (Partner Contribution)

playbook.description: This playbook updates the severity of an Expanse Behavior incident based on the presence of other active Exposures for the IP address.
playbook.name: Expanse Behavior Severity Update

playbook.description: Parses incident from Expanse in raw json to readable output
playbook.name: Expanse Incident Playbook

description: Deprecated - Use the Expanse v2 integration instead. The Expanse App for Demisto leverages the Expander API to retrieve network exposures and create incidents in Demisto.
